column2: BRIEF-Independence Holding Says Resumed Purchasing Shares Of Common Stock In Open Market Transactions June 11 (Reuters) - Independence Holding Co: * INDEPENDENCE HOLDING CO - RESUMED PURCHASING SHARES OF COMMON STOCK IN OPEN MARKET TRANSACTIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Independence Holding Co Announces Preliminary Results Of Tender Offer To Repurchase Up To 1 Mln Shares Of Common Stock May 21 (Reuters) - Independence Holding Co: * MPANY ANNOUNCES THE PRELIMINARY RESULTS OF ITS TENDER OFFER TO REPURCHASE UP TO 1,000,000 SHARES OF ITS COMMON STOCK * EXPECTS TO ACCEPT FOR PURCHASE A TOTAL OF 36,615 SHARES AT A PURCHASE PRICE OF $27.00 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Independence Holding Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.29 May 7 (Reuters) - Independence Holding Co: * OUTBREAK HAS NOT HAD A MATERIAL NEGATIVE IMPACT ON Q1 RESULTS * INDEPENDENCE - MAY INCUR ADDITIONAL EXPENSES FOR BALANCE OF YEAR DUE TO POSSIBLE COVID-19 RELATED CLAIMS ACTIVITY AND POSSIBLE DELAYED PREMIUM PAYMENTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Independence Holding Reports Launch Of Medicare Supplement April 29 (Reuters) - Independence Holding Co: * INDEPENDENCE HOLDING COMPANY ANNOUNCES LAUNCH OF MEDICARE SUPPLEMENT UNDERWRITTEN BY INDEPENDENCE AMERICAN INSURANCE COMPANY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Independence Holding Company Announces Commencement Of Tender Offer To Repurchase Up To 1,000,000 Shares Of Its Common Stock April 24 (Reuters) - Independence Holding Co: * INDEPENDENCE HOLDING COMPANY ANNOUNCES COMMENCEMENT OF TENDER OFFER TO REPURCHASE UP TO 1,000,000 SHARES OF ITS COMMON STOCK * INDEPENDENCE HOLDING CO - TENDER OFFER WILL EXPIRE AT 5:00 P.M., ET ON MAY 21, UNLESS EXTENDED BY IHC Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-Independence Holding To Commence Tender Offer To Repurchase Up To 1,000,000 Shares Of Its Common Stock April 17 (Reuters) - Independence Holding Co: * INDEPENDENCE HOLDING COMPANY ANNOUNCES INTENTION TO COMMENCE TENDER OFFER TO REPURCHASE UP TO 1,000,000 SHARES OF ITS COMMON STOCK * INDEPENDENCE HOLDING- INTENDS TO COMMENCE TENDER OFFER BY END OF THIS MONTH TO PURCHASE UP TO 1 MILLION COâ€™S COMMON SHARES AT PRICE PER SHARE OF $27.00 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Independence Holding Company Announces 10% Increase In Annual Cash Dividend March 16 (Reuters) - Independence Holding Co: * INDEPENDENCE HOLDING COMPANY ANNOUNCES 10% INCREASE IN ANNUAL CASH DIVIDEND AND DECLARATION OF SEMI-ANNUAL CASH DIVIDEND Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Independence Holding Q1 Revenue $88.3 Mln Vs $71.84 Mln May 9 (Reuters) - Independence Holding Co: * MPANY ANNOUNCES 59% INCREASE IN 2018 FIRST-QUARTER RESULTS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.46 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Independence Holding Announces A 50 Pct Increase In Its Annual Dividend Rate April 16 (Reuters) - Independence Holding Co: * MPANY ANNOUNCES A 50 PCT INCREASE IN ITS ANNUAL DIVIDEND RATE * BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAS VOTED TO INCREASE CASH DIVIDEND BY 50% TO $.30 PER SHARE ANNUALLY * REMAIN OPTIMISTIC THAT INCREASE IN EARNINGS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS WILL CONTINUE THROUGH 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
